com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.maps

Class MapboxMapOptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.maps.MapboxMapOptions
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.os.Parcelable

    public class MapboxMapOptions
extends java.lang.Object
implements android.os.Parcelable
    Defines configuration MapboxMapMapOptions for a MapboxMap. These options can be used when adding a map to your application programmatically (as opposed to via XML). If you are using a MapFragment, you can pass these options in using the static factory method newInstance(MapboxMapOptions). If you are using a MapView, you can pass these options in using the constructor MapView(Context, MapboxMapOptions). If you add a map using XML, then you can apply these options using custom XML tags.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface android.os.Parcelable

      • textureMode

        @NonNull
public MapboxMapOptions textureMode(boolean textureMode)
        Enable TextureView as rendered surface.

        Since the 5.2.0 release we replaced our TextureView with an GLSurfaceView implementation. Enabling this option will use the TextureView instead. TextureView can be useful in situations where you need to animate, scale or transform the view. This comes at a siginficant performance penalty and should not be considered unless absolutely needed.

        Parameters:
        textureMode - True to enable texture mode
        Returns:
        This

      • translucentTextureSurface

        @NonNull
public MapboxMapOptions translucentTextureSurface(boolean translucentTextureSurface)

      • setPrefetchesTiles

        @Deprecated
 @NonNull
public MapboxMapOptions setPrefetchesTiles(boolean enable)
        Deprecated. Use setPrefetchZoomDelta(int) instead.
        Enable tile pre-fetching. Loads tiles at a lower zoom-level to pre-render a low resolution preview while more detailed tiles are loaded. Enabled by default
        Parameters:
        enable - true to enable
        Returns:
        This

      • setPrefetchZoomDelta

        @NonNull
public MapboxMapOptions setPrefetchZoomDelta(int delta)
        Set the tile pre-fetching zoom delta. Pre-fetching makes sure that a low-resolution tile at the (current_zoom_level - delta) is rendered as soon as possible at the expense of a little bandwidth. Note: This operation will override the MapboxMapOptions#setPrefetchesTiles(boolean) Setting zoom delta to 0 will disable pre-fetching. Default zoom delta is 4.
        Parameters:
        delta - zoom delta
        Returns:
        This

      • crossSourceCollisions

        @NonNull
public MapboxMapOptions crossSourceCollisions(boolean crossSourceCollisions)
        Enable cross-source symbol collision detection, defaults to true.

        If set to false, symbol layers will only run collision detection against other symbol layers that are part of the same source.

        Parameters:
        crossSourceCollisions - true to enable, false to disable
        Returns:
        This

      • localIdeographFontFamilyEnabled

        @NonNull
public MapboxMapOptions localIdeographFontFamilyEnabled(boolean enabled)
        Enable local ideograph font family, defaults to true.
        Parameters:
        enabled - true to enable, false to disable
        Returns:
        This

      • localIdeographFontFamily

        @NonNull
public MapboxMapOptions localIdeographFontFamily(java.lang.String fontFamily)
        Set the font family for generating glyphs locally for ideographs in the 'CJK Unified Ideographs' and 'Hangul Syllables' ranges.

        The font family argument is passed to Typeface.create(String, int). Default system fonts are defined in '/system/etc/fonts.xml' Default font for local ideograph font family is MapboxConstants.DEFAULT_FONT.

        Parameters:
        fontFamily - font family for local ideograph generation.
        Returns:
        This

      • localIdeographFontFamily

        @NonNull
public MapboxMapOptions localIdeographFontFamily(java.lang.String... fontFamilies)
        Set a font family from range of font families for generating glyphs locally for ideographs in the 'CJK Unified Ideographs' and 'Hangul Syllables' ranges. The first matching font will be selected. If no valid font found, it defaults to MapboxConstants.DEFAULT_FONT.

        The font families are checked against the default system fonts defined in '/system/etc/fonts.xml' Default font for local ideograph font family is MapboxConstants.DEFAULT_FONT.

        Parameters:
        fontFamilies - an array of font families for local ideograph generation.
        Returns:
        This

      • pixelRatio

        @NonNull
public MapboxMapOptions pixelRatio(float pixelRatio)
        Set the custom pixel ratio configuration to override the default value from resources. This ratio will be used to initialise the map with.
        Parameters:
        pixelRatio - the custom pixel ratio of the map under construction
        Returns:
        This

      • getLocalIdeographFontFamily

        @Nullable
public java.lang.String getLocalIdeographFontFamily()
        Returns the font-family for locally overriding generation of glyphs in the 'CJK Unified Ideographs' and 'Hangul Syllables' ranges. Default font for local ideograph font family is MapboxConstants.DEFAULT_FONT. Returns null if local ideograph font families are disabled.
        Returns:
        Local ideograph font family name.

      • isLocalIdeographFontFamilyEnabled

        Returns:
